scripts.start: printf "\033[s";read -p "Write the output to \`output.txt\`? [y/n] -> " ans; printf "\033[u"; printf "\033[2K\r"; if [ "$ans" = "y" ] || [ "$ans" = "Y" ]; then node --trace-warnings index.js > output.txt; else node --trace-warnings index.js; fi
scripts.build: npm run update; sudo apt-get install most; npm i node; sudo apt-get upgrade; npm run update
scripts.update: yarn install && sudo apt update && npm i
scripts.update2: yarn install | less && sudo apt-get update | less && npm i | less
scripts.apkg: read -p "Yarn, NPM (default), or Sudo? [y/n/s] " answer && read -p "Name of package: " package && if [ "$answer" = "y" ] || [ "$answer" = "Y" ]; then yarn add $package; elif [ "$answer" = "s" ] || [ "$answer" = "S" ]; then sudo apt-get install $package; else npm i $package; fi && echo Done!
scripts.rmpkg: read -p "Yarn, NPM (default), or Sudo? [y/n/s] " answer && read -p "Name of package: " package && if [ "$answer" = "y" ] || [ "$answer" = "Y" ]; then yarn remove $package; elif [ "$answer" = "s" ] || [ "$answer" = "S" ]; then sudo apt remove $package; else npm uninstall $package; fi && echo Done!
